title: Citi Nicaragua Introduces Citigold During the First "Nicaragua Is" Awards
summary: Managua, Nicaragua – Citi Nicaragua unveiled its exclusive global service, Citigold, at the first edition of the "Nicaragua is" awards, held September 1 in Managua.
tag-1: Citi Nicaragua Introduces Citigold During the First "Nicaragua Is" Awards
tag-3: Managua, Nicaragua – Citi Nicaragua unveiled its exclusive global service, Citigold, at the first edition of the "Nicaragua is" awards, held September 1 in Managua.
tag-4: Citigold is an exclusive and personalized service of Citibank, standard for a global bank with a presence in more than 100 countries and a client base of 1.2 million CitiGold Members around the world. With the launching of Citigold in Nicaragua, the bank now offers its customers in the country the best advice for portfolio management as well as local and international investments, access to preferential and exclusive services, assistance in the 4,000 Citigold points of presence around the world and a close client-advisor relationship, which goes hand-in-hand with the lifestyle of the affluent segment in the Central American region.
tag-5: "With the launching of Citigold, we will be able to offer our clients world-class service, advice and solutions available for the first time in Nicaraguan banking," said Amalia Barrios, CCO of Citi Nicaragua. "With this announcement, we validate our role as the sole global bank in Nicaragua and reaffirm our commitment to accompany the country's growth."
tag-6: The new service was announced at the "Nicaragua is" awards, where the bank honored two individuals for their excellence in social responsibility. Mrs. Vivian Pellas is known for her continuous efforts in bringing opportunities to those who need it most. In addition, Citi recognized the memory of Mr. Mario Salvo for his legacy as an extraordinary businessman who fostered the development of Nicaragua.
tag-7: Citi executives presented the award to Pellas for excellence in social responsibility for her 20 years of work in APROQUEN, a world-class nonprofit organization that has been providing integral services in Nicaragua for children with burns and cleft palate. Her leadership abilities guiding APROQUEN are now transcending the borders of Nicaragua, making its way into nearby countries.
tag-8: "Nicaragua is" celebrated the distinguished memory of Mario Salvo, an entrepreneur who founded the ESKIMO company. His legacy of promoting new jobs, providing world-class products and having the highest values are still alive in the hands of second- and third-generation leaders who continue to invest in Nicaragua and contribute to the development of the country.
tag-9: "The 'Nicaragua is' awards demonstrate our corporate social responsibility and commitment to continue working to make Nicaragua a better country for everyone," said Amalia Barrios.

tag-11: The first Citigold Service Center is now open. It is a privileged, safe and comfortable facility located at the building in front of the Pedagogical College, first floor, Managua (phone 2277-0099).
